site.title: FreshPress
site.description: 基于Fresh框架的现代静态站点生成器
site.author: FreshPress Team

hero.title: FreshPress
hero.subtitle: 基于Fresh的现代静态站点生成器，快速构建你的网站

items.title: 现代化架构
items.description: 基于Deno和Fresh框架，使用岛屿架构（Islands Architecture）实现高性能渲染，最小化客户端JavaScript。

items.title: 多语言支持
items.description: 内置国际化系统，轻松支持多语言内容，自动根据用户语言设置切换显示内容。

items.title: 智能搜索
items.description: 全文搜索功能，支持搜索博客文章、项目和其他内容，根据相关性排序结果。

items.title: Markdown增强
items.description: 支持代码高亮、自动目录生成、自定义组件等Markdown增强功能，让内容展示更丰富。

items.title: 主题系统
items.description: 基于CSS变量的主题系统，支持亮色和暗色模式，可自定义网站风格和颜色方案。

items.title: 静态站点生成
items.description: 支持完全静态化生成，部署到任何静态托管服务，同时保留服务端功能。

changes: 完整的静态站点生成支持

quickStart.title: 快速开始
quickStart.subtitle: 只需几步，即可创建您自己的FreshPress网站

steps.title: 3. 创建内容
steps.code:
# 在blog目录下创建Markdown文件
touch blog/my-first-post.md

blog.title: 博客文章
blog.description: 分享技术心得和项目经验

footer.copyright: © {year} FreshPress 团队。保留所有权利。
footer.poweredBy: 由 Fresh 和 Deno 强力驱动

site.title: FreshPress
site.description: A modern static site generator based on Fresh framework
site.author: FreshPress Team

hero.title: FreshPress
hero.subtitle: A modern static site generator based on Fresh framework, build your website fast

items.title: Modern Architecture
items.description: Based on Deno and Fresh framework, using Islands Architecture for high-performance rendering with minimal client-side JavaScript.

items.title: Multilingual Support
items.description: Built-in internationalization system, easily support multilingual content, automatically switch display content according to user language settings.

items.title: Smart Search
items.description: Full-text search functionality, support searching blog posts, projects and other content, sorting results by relevance.

items.title: Enhanced Markdown
items.description: Support for code highlighting, automatic table of contents generation, custom components and other Markdown enhancements for richer content presentation.

items.title: Theme System
items.description: CSS variable-based theme system, supporting light and dark modes, customizable website styles and color schemes.

items.title: Static Site Generation
items.description: Support for fully static generation, deployment to any static hosting service, while retaining server-side functionality.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.subtitle: Just a few steps to create your own FreshPress website

steps.title: 3. Create Content
steps.code:
# Create Markdown files in the blog directory
touch blog/my-first-post.md

blog.title: Blog Posts
blog.description: Share technical insights and project experiences

projects.title: Project Showcase
projects.description: Open source projects developed by the FreshPress team
